request.description: Submit aggregator application for admin review
Check basic release service health
Create a new basic release (single or album). Response includes next step guidance and step summary.

item.name: Update Step 1 - Cover Art & Release Info

request.description: Update step 1 with cover art and release information. Response includes next step guidance and step completion status.

item.name: Update Step 2 - Audio Files & Track Info

request.description: Update step 2 with audio files and track information. Response includes next step guidance and completion status.
Update step 3 with release date, territories, partners and copyright info
Submit completed release for admin review
Get user's releases with pagination and optional status filter. Includes step progress and next step information for each release.
Get detailed information about a specific release
Request update for a live/published release
Request takedown of a live/published release
Delete a release (not allowed for live releases)
Check advanced release service health
Get available sublabels for the authenticated user. Returns sublabel IDs to use in Step 1.
Create a new advanced release. Release types: single, album, mini_album, ringtone_release. Response includes next step guidance.

item.name: Update Step 1 - Cover Art & Release Info

request.description: Update step 1 with cover art and comprehensive release information. labelName can be a string (auto-converted) or sublabel ObjectId.
Update step 2 with track details and audio files. Single/Ringtone releases allow only 1 track.
Update step 3 with delivery dates, territorial rights, distribution partners, and copyright information.
Submit completed advanced release for admin review. All 3 steps must be completed.

query.description: Filter by status: draft, submitted, under_review, processing, published, live, rejected

Request takedown of a live or published advanced release from all distribution platforms.

request.description:
COMPREHENSIVE ANALYTICS DASHBOARD

Get all analytics data in one API call - perfect for royalty, bonus, and streaming data management:

 OVERVIEW METRICS:
 Total streams & growth %
 Total revenue & growth %
 Countries reached
 Active listeners

 TIME SERIES CHARTS:
 Streams over time
 Revenue over time

 TOP CONTENT:
 Top performing tracks

 DISTRIBUTION DATA:
 Platform distribution (Spotify, YouTube, Apple Music, Amazon, Netease, Resso)
 Country distribution

 AUDIENCE INSIGHTS:
 Listeners by country
 Listeners by platform

 REVENUE BREAKDOWN:
 Revenue by platform
 Total revenue metrics

Everything filtered by your accountId - all your music analytics in one efficient call!

query.description: Options: last_7_days, last_30_days, last_90_days, last_6_months, last_year, custom

request.description:
COMPREHENSIVE ROYALTY DASHBOARD

Get all royalty and bonus royalty data in one API call - perfect for managing both ROYALTY and BONUS_ROYALTY together:

 OVERVIEW METRICS:
 Total earnings (regular + bonus)
 This month money & growth %
 Bonus royalty totals
 Regular royalty totals

 TRENDS OVER TIME:
 Monthly royalty trends
 Monthly bonus royalty trends

 COMPOSITION ANALYSIS:
 Regular vs bonus breakdown
 Percentage distribution
 Bonus royalty composition

 PERFORMANCE METRICS:
 Average Monthly (Regular & Bonus)
 Best Month (Regular & Bonus)
 Growth Rate (Regular & Bonus)

 PLATFORM DATA:
 Revenue by Platform (Regular & Bonus)
 Platform Performance
 Bonus Revenue by Platform
 Bonus Platform Performance

 TOP EARNING TRACKS:
 Top Earning Tracks (Regular)
 Top Earning Tracks for Bonuses

Everything filtered by your accountId following the same pattern as analytics dashboard - all your royalty data in one efficient call!

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 1000ms", function () {
